name: Disable public IP addresses for EC2 instances
description: Ensure that EC2 instances are not assigned public IP addresses. Use private IP addresses and access instances through a bastion host or VPN connection.

name: Enable encryption for EBS volumes
description: Ensure that all EBS volumes attached to EC2 instances are encrypted using AWS KMS Customer Managed Keys (CMKs).

name: Attach IAM roles to EC2 instances
description: Ensure that IAM roles are attached to EC2 instances instead of using IAM user credentials. This follows the principle of least privilege and improves security management.

name: Enforce the use of IMDSv2 on EC2 instances
description: Ensure that Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2) is enforced on all EC2 instances to protect against SSRF vulnerabilities.

name: Remove sensitive information from EC2 user data
description: Ensure that no sensitive information or secrets are stored in EC2 user data. Use AWS Secrets Manager or Systems Manager Parameter Store for managing secrets.

name: Enable detailed monitoring for EC2 instances
description: Ensure that detailed monitoring is enabled for EC2 instances to provide more frequent metrics and improve visibility into instance performance and health.

name: Use EBS-optimized instances
description: Ensure that EC2 instances are EBS-optimized to provide dedicated throughput between EC2 and EBS, optimizing storage performance.

name: Restrict security group ingress rules
description: Ensure that security group ingress rules do not allow unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0) to any port. Restrict access to specific IP ranges or security groups.

name: Use VPC endpoints for AWS service access
description: Implement VPC endpoints to securely access AWS services from EC2 instances without requiring internet access or NAT devices.

name: Enable termination protection for critical EC2 instances
description: Enable termination protection for critical EC2 instances to prevent accidental termination.

name: Use latest generation instance types
description: Ensure that EC2 instances use the latest generation instance types to benefit from improved performance and security features.

name: Implement EC2 instance patching using AWS Systems Manager
description: Use AWS Systems Manager Patch Manager to automate the process of patching EC2 instances with security updates and bug fixes.

name: Enable EBS snapshot encryption
description: Ensure that all EBS snapshots are encrypted using AWS KMS Customer Managed Keys (CMKs).

name: Implement EC2 instance isolation using dedicated hosts or instances
description: Use EC2 Dedicated Hosts or Dedicated Instances for workloads requiring physical isolation at the host hardware level.

name: Enable VPC flow logs
description: Ensure that VPC flow logs are enabled to capture information about IP traffic going to and from network interfaces in the VPC.
